Ingredients.1: 8 cups salad greens, washed and torn into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.2: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.3: 1 (15 ounce) can whole pitted black olives, drained

Ingredients.4: 1 (14 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and quartered

Ingredients.6: 8 ounces cooked and chilled shell pasta

Ingredients.9: 0.5 cups Italian-style salad dressing, or to taste

Directions.1: Toss salad greens, garbanzo beans, black olives, artichoke hearts, tuna, shell pasta, cucumber, and tomato together in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate salad until lettuce is crisp and mixture is chilled, at least 2 hours.

Directions.2: Toss salad with salad dressing immediately before serving.
